LMEProblemType

Determines the type of linear matrix equation

Synopsis

typedef enum { LME_LYAPUNOV,
               LME_SYLVESTER,
               LME_GEN_LYAPUNOV,
               LME_GEN_SYLVESTER,
               LME_DT_LYAPUNOV ,
               LME_STEIN} LMEProblemType;

See Also

LMESetProblemType(), LMEGetProblemType()

Level

beginner

Location

include/slepclme.h

Examples

src/lme/tutorials/ex32.c.html
